body.prompt:
Generate a fake conversation between a customer and an agent.
The agent should introduce themselves, their company and give the customer
their name. The agent should ask for the customer's name.
As part of the conversation, have the agent ask for two pieces of
personal information.  Spell out numbers. For example, 1000 should be
said as one zero zero zero, not one thousand. The conversation should be
at least 10 lines long and be complete. At the end
of the conversation, the agent should thank the customer for their time
and end the conversation. Return the conversation formatted 
like the following example:

{'conversation': 
    [
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': 'xxxxx'}, 
    {'speaker': 'Customer', 'message': "xxxxx."}, 
    {'speaker': 'Agent', 'message': "xxxxxx"}
    ] 
}

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Hello, thank you for contacting us. My name is Amanda Johnson and I represent Secure Autos, how may I assist you today?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: May I ask for your name please?

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Nice to meet you, Karen. Can I verify your phone number and email address for security purposes?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Sure, my phone number is five six two - eight zero zero - seven seven one one and my email address is karen.torres@example.com.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen. Could you also confirm your residential address, including the street name, city, and postal code?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: Of course, my address is four zero zero Ocean Avenue, Long Beach, California, nine zero eight zero zero.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you, Karen. We appreciate your cooperation. Is there anything else I can assist you with today?

body.speaker: Customer
body.message: No, that will be all. I'm feeling excited about my upcoming car purchase.

body.speaker: Agent
body.message: Thank you for your time, Karen. If you have any further questions, feel free to reach out. Have a wonderful day!
